courseleaf.title: Contact Us
courseleaf.text:
Berkeley Academic Guide

We welcome your feedback and suggestions. Please email guide@berkeley.edu to contact Juliana Golden, Managing Editor.

The Berkeley Academic Guide is produced by the Office of the Registrar.

Class Schedule

For comments or questions regarding the Class Schedule (classes.berkeley.edu), please email class-schedule@berkeley.edu.

Other Contact Resources

Berkeley Office of Undergraduate Admissions: 510-642-3175

Berkeley Graduate Division Admissions: 510-642-7405

Berkeley International Office: 510-642-2818
